metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7415 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the Locale class in common/locid.cpp in International Components for Unicode (ICU) through 57.1 for C/C++ allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a long locale string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7415` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu52 - 52.1-3ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '52.1-3ubuntu0.5').
